mapper.select: SELECT mi.Member_ID, mi.Member_No, mi.Logname, mi.Member_Type, CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),#{skey})) using utf8) Personal_Name, mi.Reg_Date, pbi.House_Address, CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Phone),#{skey})) using utf8) Personal_Phone, (select count(1) from Member_Info mif where mif.BeinvitateCode = mi.InvitateCode) Total_Invite, ia.Check_Statu FROM InviteMaster_Apply ia JOIN Member_Info mi ON ia.Member_ID = mi.Member_ID JOIN personal_base_info pbi ON mi.Personal_Id = pbi.Personal_Id WHERE IF(#{Member_No} IS NULL OR #{Member_No} = '', 1=1, mi.Member_No = #{Member_No}) AND IF(#{Logname} IS NULL, 1=1, LOCATE(#{Logname},mi.Logname)>0) AND IF(#{Reg_Date_Min} IS NULL OR #{Reg_Date_Min} = '', 1=1, mi.Reg_Date>=#{Reg_Date_Min}) AND IF(#{Reg_Date_Max} IS NULL OR #{Reg_Date_Max} = '', 1=1, mi.Reg_Date<=#{Reg_Date_Max}) AND IF(#{Personal_Name} IS NULL, 1=1, LOCATE(#{Personal_Name},CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),#{skey})) using utf8))>0) AND IF(#{House_Address} IS NULL, 1=1, LOCATE(#{House_Address},pbi.House_Address)>0) AND IF(#{Check_Statu} IS NULL OR #{Check_Statu} = '', 1=1, ia.Check_Statu = #{Check_Statu}) ORDER BY mi.Reg_Date ASC DESC

SELECT mi.Member_ID, mi.Member_No, mi.Logname, CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),#{skey})) using utf8) Personal_Name, pbi.House_Address, CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Phone),#{skey})) using utf8) Personal_Phone, (SELECT (CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) FROM Member_Third_Info mti where mti.Member_ID = mi.Member_ID) IS_Third, (select sum(ifnull(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount_Valid),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)) FROM Invest_Record ir WHERE ir.Member_ID = mi.Member_ID) Invest_Amount, (select sum(ifnull(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount_Valid),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)) FROM Invest_Record ir JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON ir.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id WHERE pa.Member_ID = mi.Member_ID) Repay_Amount, im.Im_No, mif.Logname Invite_Logname FROM Member_Info mi JOIN Member_Info mif ON mi.BeinvitateCode = mif.InvitateCode JOIN Invite_Master im ON mif.Member_ID = im.Member_ID JOIN personal_base_info pbi ON mi.Personal_Id = pbi.Personal_Id WHERE IF(#{Im_No} IS NULL OR #{Im_No} = '', 1=1, im.Im_No = #{Im_No}) ORDER BY im.Im_No ASC DESC

SELECT ss.Seo_Set_ID, ss.Seo_Title, ss.Seo_Description, ss.Seo_Keyword, sst.Seo_Type_Name, ss.Opt_Date, (select a.adminName from Admin a where a.Admin_ID = ss.Admin_ID) adminName FROM Seo_Set ss JOIN (SELECT Seo_Type_ID,max(Opt_Date) Opt_Date from Seo_Set where Statu =1 group by Seo_Type_ID) s ON ss.Seo_Type_ID = s.Seo_Type_ID AND ss.Opt_Date = s.Opt_Date JOIN Seo_Set_Type sst ON ss.Seo_Type_ID = sst.Seo_Type_ID AND sst.Statu = 1 ORDER BY sst.Seo_Type_Name

SELECT ra.Affair_ID, ra.CreateTime, ra.Start_Date, ra.End_Date, ra.Affair_Name, (select sum(rdr.Quantity) from Redpackets_Detail_Record rdr where rdr.Affair_ID = ra.Affair_ID) Quantity, ra.Affair_Account, (select sum((rdr.Quantity-rdr.Remain_Quantity)*rdr.Gift_Amount) from Redpackets_Detail_Record rdr where rdr.Affair_ID = ra.Affair_ID ) Receive_Affair, (select sum(rdr.Gift_Amount*rdr.Remain_Quantity) from Redpackets_Detail_Record rdr where rdr.Affair_ID = ra.Affair_ID ) Remaining_Affair, ra.Statu FROM Redpackets_Affair ra WHERE IF(#{CreateTime_Min} IS NULL OR #{CreateTime_Min} = '', 1=1, ra.CreateTime>=#{CreateTime_Min}) AND IF(#{CreateTime_Max} IS NULL OR #{CreateTime_Max} = '', 1=1, ra.CreateTime<=#{CreateTime_Max}) AND IF(#{Start_Date_Min} IS NULL OR #{Start_Date_Min} = '', 1=1, ra.Start_Date>=#{Start_Date_Min}) AND IF(#{Start_Date_Max} IS NULL OR #{Start_Date_Max} = '', 1=1, ra.Start_Date<=#{Start_Date_Max}) AND IF(#{End_Date_Min} IS NULL OR #{End_Date_Min} = '', 1=1, ra.End_Date>=#{End_Date_Min}) AND IF(#{End_Date_Max} IS NULL OR #{End_Date_Max} = '', 1=1, ra.End_Date<=#{End_Date_Max}) AND IF(#{Statu} IS NULL OR #{Statu} = '', 1=1, ra.Statu=#{Statu}) ORDER BY (case upper(#{ordercolumn}) WHEN 'CREATETIME' THEN ra.CreateTime WHEN 'START_DATE' THEN ra.Start_Date WHEN 'END_DATE' THEN ra.End_Date ELSE ra.CreateTime END) ASC DESC

SELECT mr.Receive_Date, (select mi.Logname from Member_Info mi where mi.Member_ID = mr.Member_ID) Logname, mr.Gift_Amount, mr.Statu FROM Member_Redpackets mr JOIN Redpackets_Detail_Record rdr ON mr.Project_Id = rdr.RP_Detail_ID AND mr.Gift_Type = 0 AND MR.Statu BETWEEN 1 AND 2 WHERE rdr.Affair_ID = #{Affair_ID} UNION ALL
SELECT mr.Receive_Date, (select mi.Logname from Member_Info mi where mi.Member_ID = mr.Member_ID) Logname, mr.Gift_Amount, (case when mr.End_Date > now() then 3 else 0 end )Statu FROM Member_Redpackets mr JOIN Redpackets_Detail_Record rdr ON mr.Project_Id = rdr.RP_Detail_ID AND mr.Gift_Type = 0 AND mr.Statu = 0 WHERE rdr.Affair_ID = #{Affair_ID}
select Open_Account_RP as openAccountRP,Open_Account_RP as firstRechargeRP from Member_Redpackets_Set limit 1
select FI_RP_ID as firpID,Invest_Amount as investAmount,RP_Rate as rpRate from Member_FirstInvest_Redpackets_Set where FI_RP_ID = #{fiRpID}
select First_Invest_Set as firstInvestSet,Invite_Set as inviteSet, First_Borrow_Set as firstBorrowSet ,First_Recharge_Set as firstRechargeSet from Cps_Invite_Set
SELECT ss.Seo_Set_ID, ss.Seo_Type_ID, ss.Seo_Title, ss.Seo_Description, ss.Seo_Keyword, ss.Opt_Date FROM Seo_Set ss where ss.Seo_Set_ID = #{seoSetID}
SELECT Seo_Type_ID as seoTypeID, Seo_Type_Name as seoTypeName FROM Seo_Set_Type where Statu = 1
